text: Joe Alwyn suits up for the Trophee Chopard Ceremony! The The Favourite actor – aka Taylor Swift ‘ s boyfriend – attended the event held during the 2018 Cannes Film Festival at Hotel Martinez on Monday ( May 14 ) in Cannes, France. The event marked Joe ‘ s Cannes Film Festival red carpet debut. He was joined by Elizabeth Debicki as they both accepted the Chopard Trophy, which highlights the up - and - coming generation of the international film industry. “ I haven ’ t been to Cannes before so to come here to such a prestigious festival for my first time and to receive this award is amazing and such an honor, especially seeing the list of people who have won it before, it ’ s amazing to be added to that – that group of names, ” Joe said ( via E!
